name: vote-tracking
description: meta vote tracking stats and DB

scripts.testnet: npm run build && node dist/main.js test
scripts.dry: npm run build && node dist/main.js dry
scripts.test-migrate-lp-vp: npm run build && node dist/main.js test migrate-lp-vp
scripts.test-migrate-aud: npm run build && node dist/main.js test migrate-aud
scripts.migrate: npm run build && node dist/main.js migrate
scripts.start: npm run build && echo 'check scripts/every-hour.sh, include it in crontab'
scripts.save-voters: npm run build && node dist/main.js dry save-voters
